Dr.Fatimetou med Salek Directrice générale, Consultante

Building Cloud-powered wearable Apps

Language: en Complexity: Intermediate

I will speak and show how to:
- Respond to touch events in your views with touch feedback animations.
- Hide and show views with reveal effect animations.
- Switch between activities with custom activity transition animations.
- Create more natural animations with curved motion.
- Animate changes in one or more view properties with view state change animations.
- Create icon morphing transition

View presentation

Android L Animation

Language: en Complexity: Intermediate

More than ever before, developing for global audience is a necessity than a luxury in today's world. Are you ready ... where to start? what does it entail? how do I do it? how to promote in local markets? This talk will address above questions for android, chrome and web developers. In our journey of the where, what and how, we will take an in-depth look at various internationalization and localization tools & strategies available to you.

View presentation

Dr.Sidi Soueina , Ecole d'Atar

Building Cloud-powered wearable Apps

khadjetou Abed créatrice de l'application DiapApp , MauriApp challenge
